attributes.action: register all trailer caravans with the DVLA so the owners pay an annual road fund tax and the caravan is mechanically checked with an annual MOT inspection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Caravans are a popular method of taking a holiday.  There needs to be regulated control of the standard of these vehicles to ensure road safety.  The caravan should be subject to an annual inspection at an MOT testing station and also the owner should pay an annual road tax to tow it on the public highway
